articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Belgian King
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Belgian King
Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Monday sent a message of greetings to Albert II, King of Belgium, on the occasion of its national day. 
					 In the message he wished the people of Belgium well-being.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Colombian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Colombian President
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on Tuesday sent a message of greetings to Alvaro Uribe Velez, President of Colombia, on the occasion of the 200th anniversary of its independence.
					 Kim Yong Nam in the message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Colombia would continue to develop.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation to Attend Int'l Meetings
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation to Attend Int'l Meetings
Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- A DPRK delegation headed by Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun left here Tuesday to attend the ARF to be held in Hanoi and the Special Ministerial Meeting for MDGs Review in Asia and the Pacific to be held in Jakarta and visit Vietnam, Laos, Myanmar and Indonesia.

articles.title: Military Attaches Corps Visits Jonsung Museum
articles.content:
Military Attaches Corps Visits Jonsung Museum
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- The military attaches corps here visited the Jonsung Revolutionary Museum Tuesday on the occasion of the 57th anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War. 
					 Members of the corps laid bouquets before a mosaic portraying President Kim Il Sung in boundless reverence for him and paid tribute to him.
					
					 Being briefed on the facts that the President steered the war to a great victory and unrolled a far-reaching plan for postwar rehabilitation and construction, they looked round with keen interest historical mementoes and materials.
					
					 They made entries in the visitor's book at the end of the visit.

articles.title: Preview of New Film
articles.content:
Preview of New Film
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- The Korean April 25 Film Studio produced feature film "Lovely Sunshine" (Part 1).
					 A preview of the film was held at the People's Palace of Culture on Tuesday.
					
					 It was appreciated by senior party, army and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of  party, armed forces, power organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions and working people in the city of Pyongyang.
					
					 The film impressively shows, through portrayal of the heroine and other servicepersons' wives, that the contest of art groups of servicepersons' wives, which came into being under the meticulous leadership and care of Kim Jong Il, is a stage of love that puts them forward as women revolutionaries and the second bugler in the era of Songun and trains them to be creators of the Songun culture.

articles.title: New Postage Stamps Issued
articles.content:
New Postage Stamps Issued
						
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- A souvenir sheet has been issued in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea with the approach of the 25th Asian International Stamp Exhibition "BANGKOK 2010".
					 Seen in the upper part of the sheet with the emblem of the exhibition is an inscription "60th Anniv. of the International Children's Day" written in Korean and English. Printed in its center is a picture of Korean children enjoying a happy life.
					
					 A sheetlet containing impressive pictures of such Korean cartoon films as "Butterfly and Cock" and "The Clever Raccon Dog" has also been issued.

articles.title: Potato Yogurt Made for Children
articles.content:
Potato Yogurt Made for Children
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- Potato yogurt has been produced in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea for the improvement of children's health.
					 It, developed by the Research Institute for Nutrition Care of Children under the Academy of Medical Science, is good for the prevention and treatment of diarrhea and indigestion.
					
					 The institute made it by fermenting lactic bacteria after removing solanine from potato and turning high molecular substances into low molecular ones.
					
					 The yogurt contains various nutritious, antibiotic and immune matters, digestion enzymes, etc.

articles.title: Opera "A Dream of Red Mansions" Staged in Dalian, China
articles.content:
Opera "A Dream of Red Mansions" Staged in Dalian, China
Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- Opera "A Dream of Red Mansions" was staged before full house in Dalian, Liaoning Province, the last leg of Korean artistes' performance tour in China, on July 17 and 18.
					 The opera performed at the Grand Theatre in the Dalian Development District mesmerized audiences and won their acclaim.  
					
					After watching the performance, the deputy mayor of Dalian City said that the performance of the opera is of special significance in cultural exchange between the two countries, adding that the performance tour which took place in the wake of the China visit of General Secretary Kim Jong Il contributed to the development of the Sino-DPRK friendly relations.
					
					 Expressing admiration at the Korean artistes' profound understanding of "A Dream of Red Mansions", one of the four classic masterpieces of China, he hoped that they would achieve greater successes in their creation and performance.
					
					 Dalian City TV, Dalian Development District TV and Dalian Daily and other media reported in detail about the arrival of the Phibada Opera Troupe there and accounts of its performances.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Rebukes Asahi Shimbun's Anti-DPRK Diatribe
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Rebukes Asahi Shimbun's Anti-DPRK Diatribe 
						
Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- Recently the Japanese Asahi Shimbun carried serial articles on the false "story about the DPRK's collapse", letting loose a string of unspeakable invectives slandering the DPRK which is giving spurs to building a thriving nation.
					 This is an unpardonable action committed by those, displeased with the achievements made by the DPRK in building a thriving nation, to tarnish the image of the DPRK, and a reckless action perpetrated by the paid trumpeter, the reactionary reptile paper dancing to the tune of the U.S.
					
					 The vicious anti-DPRK false propaganda kicked off by Japanese media which had already been reduced to political plot-breeding organs was a provocation perpetrated in pursuance of the Japanese reactionaries' hostile policy towards the DPRK.
					
					 Asahi Shimbun, acting a political maid and paid trumpeter, has taken an active part in the malignant smear campaign against the DPRK while joining hands with anti-DPRK groups. This is as foolish an act as digging its own grave, oblivious of the original mission of media, as it styled itself a champion of justice and truth in the past.
					
					 The recent provocative editorial program of the paper offers an undeniable proof that it has been reduced to a reptile paper little different from Sankei Shimbun, an ultra right-wing paper. 
					
					 It is none other than Asahi Shimbun that has become desperate in spearheading the campaign to execute the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK and the anti-DPRK campaign launched by the Japanese authorities pursuant to its policy.
					
					 In recent years this paper has interfered in the DPRK-related issues on the international arena with unusual zeal and has kept itself busy misleading the international public opinion over the DPRK even begging help from riffs-raffs. 
					
					 Those who contributed dirty articles to the paper were ultra right conservatives of the U.S. and Japan who are steeped in anti-DPRK sentiment to the marrow of their bones without exception and, it is, therefore, quite natural that only anti-DPRK vituperation can be heard from them. What matters here is why this paper has become so desperate in the anti-DPRK campaign.
					
					 It is prompted by its calculation that it can please its U.S. master and right-wing forces in Japan by hurting the prestige and dignity of the DPRK and fanning up bitterness towards the DPRK in the Japanese society.
					
					 In a word, Asahi Shimbun could not conceal its true colors as a dirty reptile paper which was bribed for conducting propaganda against the DPRK.
					
					 But the Japanese reactionaries' anti-DPRK propaganda will get them nowhere. 
					
					 No one in the world will lend an ear to their anti-DPRK rhetoric and the drive of the people of the DPRK to build a thriving nation is an epoch-making cause which no one can block.
					
					 Tricksters of Asahi Shimbun should not misjudge the trend of the times and they will have to pay dearly for their politically-motivated provocation against the DPRK.

articles.title: Projected S. Korea-US Joint Saber-rattling Assailed
articles.content:
Projected S. Korea-US Joint Saber-rattling Assailed
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- The puppet Ministry of National Defense of south Korea on July 15 announced that south Korea-U.S. joint military exercises would be staged in the East and West Seas of Korea within this month and its specific action plan would be decided upon at "the talks between the U.S. and south Korean diplomatic and defense chiefs" slated to take place in Seoul on July 21.
					 Minju Joson Tuesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 The joint military exercises to be staged by the group of traitors together with its U.S. master despite strong public protest and denunciation at home and abroad are a very dangerous saber-rattling aimed at further straining the already deadlocked inter-Korean relations and igniting a nuclear war against the DPRK, while watching for a chance. 
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the operational theatres of the military exercises will be areas along the Military Demarcation Line including the waters of the West Sea where fierce armed skirmishes took place between the north and the south several times. This foretells the exercises may trigger off an all-out war.
					
					 The puppet warmongers describe the projected joint military exercises as "counteractions against the provocation of the north", "demonstration of the muscle to deter the north" and "demonstration of armed forces against the north" in a bid to hide their danger. This is, however, nothing but rhetoric to mislead public opinion at home and abroad.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group is leaving no means untried to save its policy of confrontation with fellow countrymen from a total fiasco and stifle the DPRK through the above-said saber-rattling, but this will get it nowhere. 
					
					 The warmongers would be well advised to behave themselves, bearing deep in mind the consequences to be entailed by the above-said war moves, urges the commentary.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries' Ambition to Stage Comeback to Korea
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries' Ambition to Stage Comeback to Korea
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- Disclosed recently was a diplomatic document in which the Japanese government described the U.S. military bases in Okinawa as "deterrent" to cope with the "contingency on the Korean Peninsula" as early as from the 1960s. Fumihiko Togo, director for U.S. Affairs of the Foreign Ministry of Japan, in 1968 specified in the keynote of the speech for the Japan-U.S. high-level working consultation that as regards the role of the U.S. forces present in Okinawa "it was necessary to acquire potentiality to rapidly react to the situation on the Korean Peninsula."   Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					 This indicates that the Japanese reactionaries have long offered their territory as a logistic base for the U.S. in its aggression and war.
					
					 The sordid confab held between the U.S. and Japan over the role of the U.S military bases in Okinawa was nothing but a revelation of the black-hearted intentions of the U.S. to realize its ambition to dominate the world through the domination over the Korean Peninsula and the Japanese reactionaries to stage a comeback to Korea and realize their scenario for overseas aggression.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries' offer of Okinawa to the U.S. as its logistic base is little short of joining in the U.S. imperialists' plan for military attack upon the DPRK.
					
					 When looking back on history, it has been a crafty method for Japan to invade other countries, depending on big powers. By this method Japan invaded Asian countries in the first half of the last century.
					
					 The U.S. military bases in Okinawa are operating as main springboards for realizing the U.S. imperialists' scenario for military aggression against the DPRK from A to Z.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will surely force Japan to pay a thousand-fold price for the crimes it committed against the Koreans century after century with the merciless retaliatory blows if it dares start military actions against the DPRK in collusion with the U.S. imperialists.

articles.title: More Dynamic Advance under Banner of 6.15 Called for
articles.content:
More Dynamic Advance under Banner of 6.15 Called for
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- The June 15 joint declaration represents justice and no force on earth can arrest the patriotic struggle for reunification of the south Korean people to implement the joint declaration, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a signed article.
					 This is fully evidenced by the results of the "elections to local self-governing bodies" held in south Korea recently, the daily notes, and goes on:
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors kicked off a whirlwind of suppression of the pro-reunification democratic forces before the "elections" while getting frantic with the moves to escalate the confrontation with fellow countrymen over such hideous farce as the case of sunk warship, but it could not escape a stern judgment of the enraged people. 
					
					 The people from all walks of life in south Korea inflicted a crushing defeat on the group of traitors in the "elections" before the 10th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration. This was a great victory of the pro-reunification democratic forces over the pro-American separatist forces.
					
					 It is the only way of promoting national reconciliation and unity and accelerating the reunification of the country to support and protect the inter-Korean declarations and sincerely implement them. This represents true patriotism in the June 15 era of reunification. That was why the south Korean people dealt a sledgehammer at the treacherous forces going mad to ignite a war of aggression against the DPRK after bringing the inter-Korean relations to a total collapse, hell-bent on sycophancy toward the U.S. and moves to escalate confrontation with fellow countrymen. The reality goes to clearly prove that neither fascist repression nor anti-reunification whirlwind can ever stem the trend of the times advancing under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration.

articles.title: Full Play to Spirit of Self-Reliance Called for
articles.content:
Full Play to Spirit of Self-Reliance Called for
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- The on-going great surge is one in the drive for self-reliance and it is a manifestation of the unshakable faith and will of the army and people of Korea to open a gate to a thriving nation at any cost by their own efforts and with their own technology and resources, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a signed article.
					 The spirit of self-reliance is a noble fighting spirit deeply associated with all victories and valuable gains won by the Korean people, and it is a historical review of the Korean revolution that one can always emerge victorious only when one weathers difficulties by relying on one's own efforts with belief in them, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The on-going drive for a great surge represents a general advance for performing fresh miracles and feats by dint of the mental power of self-reliance and fortitude, a grand march for making gigantic creation and innovations by fully tapping the potential of the self-supporting economy and a general offensive for effecting great innovations and making leap forward by dint of modern science and technology.
					
					 The spirit of "Yanji bomb" that pervaded the forests of Mt. Paektu and the spirit of fortitude which was prevalent during the period of great Chollima surge are given into fuller play in the present march of great surge and the Korean people are dashing ahead like a wind, weathering all difficulties in the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance. This is the immense pride of the DPRK.
					
					 Tremendous is the potential of the self-supporting national economy which the Korean people have built, fastening belts for decades under the leadership of the great party, the article notes, clarifying that unshakable is the will of the Korean people to thoroughly implement the party's line of attaching importance to science and technology and its idea of pushing back the frontiers of the latest science and thus scale the high eminence of a thriving nation by their own efforts and with their own technology and resources.

articles.title: Participants in Movement for Issuing Declarations on Situation Convicted
articles.content:
Participants in Movement for Issuing Declarations on Situation Convicted
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- The puppet Jonju District Court of south Korea at a hearing on an appeal on July 16 convicted members of the Teachers Union (Jongyojo) who participated in the above-said movement of "crimes."
					 The authorities of the court sentenced to fine four persons including Ro Pyong Sop, head of the North Jolla Provincial branch of the Jongyojo, on charges that the above-said movement "was a breach of law as it expressed their political will," "it was a collective action against common interests" and the like. 
					
					 Earlier, the puppet Daejon District Court at a hearing on an appeal gave a verdict of guilty to leading members of the branches of Daejon and South Chungchong Province of the union on charges of violation of the "law on government employees".

articles.title: Korean People's Efforts for National Development Supported
articles.content:
Korean People's Efforts for National Development Supported
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- Abdelaziz Belkhadem, general secretary of the Algerian National Liberation Front Party, met with Kim Tong Je, DPRK ambassador to Algeria, on July 14.
					 Looking back upon the days of his visit to the DPRK with deep emotion, he said:
					
					 We deem it the greatest glory to have been honored with the audience of President Kim Il Sung. We met and saw respectable people in the DPRK. We highly appreciate the successes made by the fraternal Korean people in the fields of advanced science and technology and economic construction.
					
					 Hoping that Korea would be reunified at an early date under the banner of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration, he said that the Algerian government and the National Liberation Front Party would extend invariable support and solidarity to the Korean people in their efforts for national development and reunification.

articles.title: Korean People's Just Cause Supported by Ukrainian Figure
articles.content:
Korean People's Just Cause Supported by Ukrainian Figure
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- Nikolai Polishk, chairman of the Ukrainian "Treasured Sword of Songun" Association for the Study of the Juche Idea, issued a statement on July 13 on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					  On the occasion of the month I join the progressive people of the world in expressing support and solidarity with the Korean people in their just cause, the statement said.
					
					 The statement recalled that the three year-long Korean war imposed by the U.S. imperialists upon the Korean people was a hard-fought war as the armed forces between the two belligerent parties were imbalanced, but the Korean people rallied close around President Kim Il Sung shattered the myth of the U.S. "mightiness." 
					
					 The U.S. persistent moves to provoke a new war and, the recent case of warship "Cheonan's" sinking, in particular, fabricated by the U.S. and the south Korean authorities are bringing the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of war, it said, adding that this is touching off protest and resentment among the peace-loving people of the world.
					
					 The Korean People's Army has developed into a-match-for-a hundred armed forces capable of beating back any provocation of enemies under the leadership of Kim Jong Il, it noted, stressing that the provocations to the DPRK will bring only death to the U.S. and its followers.
					
					 The only way out for the U.S. is to apologize for the war of aggression which brought so enormous misfortune and pain to the Korean people and unconditionally pull its forces out of south Korea so that the Koreans may achieve the reunification of the country by their own efforts, the statement concluded.

articles.title: Immortal Exploits of Kim Il Sung Praised
articles.content:
Immortal Exploits of Kim Il Sung Praised
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- Seminars, lectures, book and photo exhibitions and film shows took place in Italy, Uganda, Democratic Congo, Indonesia and India between July 2 and 9 to commemorate the 16th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 On display in their venues were works of peerlessly great persons, photos on their immortal feats and books and photos introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Speeches were made at the events.
					
					 Flavio Pettinari, chief of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Songun Idea in Fermo of Italy, at a seminar praised Kim Il Sung as father of nation-building who founded the DPRK, a socialist power. 
					
					 The solid political, military and economic foundations provided by the President in his lifetime serve as the driving force for steady and dynamic advance of the DPRK, he said.
					
					 The acting executive secretary of the Ugandan National Women's Council said in a lecture that the President shared weal and woe with the people without making any difference in living, always finding himself among them all his life.
					
					 Nzemba Yangana, chairman of the Youth Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in Democratic Congo, said at a photo exhibition that the President would always live in the hearts of the progressive mankind as the sun is eternal.
					
					 The participants of the film shows watched the Korean film "'Arirang,' Mysterious Spectacle".

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia la funcion artistica de los obreros
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia la funcion artistica de los obreros 
						
Pyongyang, 20 de julio (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, presencio la funcion de los miembros del grupo artistico de la Hilanderia Kim Jong Suk de Pyongyang y del grupo de agitacion artistica movil de la Fabrica Textil de Pyongyang.
					En la escena se interpretaron las piezas de distintos generos como el coro "El General es nuestro padre", la poesia en dialogo "Cantamos del amor de los tres generales del monte Paektu", el coro femenino y pangchang "Recuerdo de la casa natal", el coro femenino "Ruisenor canta en el recinto de nuestra fabrica", la narracion de agitacion "El barco espia 'Pueblo' esta frente de la puerta principal de nuestra fabrica", el canto homofono con tambor "Mi pais donde se realizan los ideales del pueblo", el quinteto masculino y coro "!Que prospere la epoca del Partido del Trabajo!", la poesia y coro "Marchemos a todo galope hacia la gran potencia prospera", etc.
					
					En este espectaculo los ejecutantes cantaron en tono enfatico su felicidad y orgullo de abrir dinamicamente la brecha en la construccion de la potencia economica tras crecer como vanguardias de la revolucion en el regazo del Dirigente y mostraron bien el impetu combativo de la heroica clase obrera que avanza a gran velocidad hacia la cima de la gran potencia prospera con la fe y el optimismo de la victoria.
					
					La funcion marcada por la pasion revolucionaria y el impetu combativo ha sido una muestra del orgulloso aspecto de la nueva cultura de la clase obrera nacida en la epoca del Songun.
					
					El Dirigente felicito los exitos de la funcion respondiendo con la mano alzada a las aclamaciones de los interpretes y espectadores.
					
					Evaluo altamente los exitos de la funcion y agradecio a los miembros de los grupos artisticos mostrandose muy satisfecho de que ellos hayan ofrecido esta funcion excelente y perfecta en lo ideo-artistico con las piezas de mucho valor cognoscitivo y educativo que reflejan directa y francamente su vida.
					
					Dijo que en todas las piezas llevadas a la escena palpitan fuertemente la inconmovible conviccion, el optimismo revolucionario y el inmaculado mundo espiritual de la clase obrera de Corea que impulsa en la delantera la causa socialista del Juche manteniendo consecuentemente los principios clasistas sin vacilar ante cualesquier vientos y mareas.
					
					  Continuo que el arte masivo desarrollado plenamente entre los obreros de las fabricas deviene el ejemplo de la nueva cultura noble de la clase obrera de la epoca del Songun basada en la cultura revolucionaria de los militares.
					
					  El Dirigente presento las tareas programaticas para intensificar las actividades culturales y artisticas masivas.
					
					  Expreso la gran esperanza y conviccion de que en el futuro tambien, la clase obrera de Corea creara sin cesar saltos e innovaciones en la produccion y construccion tocando fuerte la trompeta de marcha en gran auge y el tambor de la revolucion.
					
					  El Dirigente estuvo acompanado en esta ocasion por el vicemariscal del EPC Kim Yong Chun, vicepresidente del CDN de la RPDC y ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares; el general de ejercito del EPC Kim Jong Gak, miembro del CDN de la RPDC y primer subjefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC; el general de ejercito del EPC Ri Yong Ho, jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC; el general de ejercito del EPC U Tong Chuk, miembro del CDN de la RPDC, y otros miembros de mando del ejercito y las instituciones de las fuerzas armadas.
					
					  Tambien, estuvieron presentes Jang Song Thaek, vicepresidente del CDN de la RPDC y jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, el secretario Kim Ki Nam, los jefes de departamento Kim Kyong Hui, Thae Jong Su y Kim Yang Gon y otros cuadros directivos del CC del PTC, los funcionarios directivos de las fabricas correspondientes y los militares del EPC.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje a Alvaro Uribe Velez
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje a Alvaro Uribe Velez
Pyongyang, 20 de julio (ATCC) -- Con motivo del bicentenario de la independencia de Colombia,  el presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 20 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica de Colombia, Alvaro Uribe Velez.
					En la misiva el remitente expresa su conviccion de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre Corea y Colombia se consolidaran y se desarrollaran continuamente.

articles.title: Editados nuevos sellos en Corea
articles.content:
Editados nuevos sellos en Corea
Pyongyang, 20 de julio (ATCC) -- Se dio a luz en Corea un papel enterizo de pequeno tamano dedicado a la XXV Exposicion Filatelica Internacional de Asia "Bangkok 2010".
					En la parte superior esta dibujado el emblema de la exposicion e inscrita en coreano e ingles la frase "En conmemoracion del 60o aniversario del Dia Internacional de la Infancia".
					
					En el centro aparecen los dichosos ninos coreanos que crecen sin envidiar nada en el mundo siendo considerados como "reyes" del pais.
					
					Por otra parte, fue impreso otro papel enterizo que muestra los episodios impresionantes de los dibujos animados como "La mariposa y el gallo" y "El tejon inteligente".

articles.title: ATCC critica la demagogia de Asahi Shimbun
articles.content:
ATCC critica la demagogia de Asahi Shimbun
Pyongyang, 20 de julio (ATCC) -- En los ultimos dias, el periodico japones Asahi Shimbun injuria con peores expresiones a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, que da acicates a la construccion de la gran potencia prospera, y publica en serie un articulo intrigante en funcion de inventar y divulgar el "rumor del derrumbe" de la RPDC.
					  Esto deviene el imperdonable acto para mellar la imagen de la RPDC, en que incurren los disgustados  de los exitos del pueblo coreano logrados en la construccion de la gran potencia prospera.
					
					  Tambien, resulta la conducta imprudente de ese medio de prensa venal y reaccionario que se deja llevar por lo que le dicta EE.UU.
					
					  La propaganda intrigante anti-RPDC de los medios de prensa de Japon, convertidos ya en organos de conspiracion politica, significa la provocacion que forma parte de la politica hostil a la RPDC de los reaccionarios japoneses.
					
					  Al proceder a la demagogia anti-RPDC sumandose a los elementos antipaticos con ella, Asahi Shimbun cometio un acto vergonzoso y suicida olvidandose de su mision, que segun este medio de prensa, es defender la justicia y la verdad.
					
					  El plan de redaccion provocativo a la RPDC es la prueba innegable de que al contrario de lo que ha hecho en el pasado, Asahi Shimbun fue convertido en la propagandista venal de igual calana que el periodico ultraderechista Sankei Shimbun.
					
					  Hoy, Asahi Shimbun actua desesperadamente poniendose al frente de la politica hostil de EE.UU. a la RPDC y la campana anti-RPDC de las autoridades japonesas adheridas a aquella.
					
					  En los ultimos anos, este periodico interviene demasiado en los asuntos relativos a Corea en la escena internacional y para colmo, anda ajetreado para inducir en error la opinion publica internacional sobre la RPDC citando los embustes de los fulanos y menganos.
					
					  Todos los personajes citados esta vez por Asahi Shimbun ensuciando los planos no son otros sino los elementos conservadores ultraderechistas de EE.UU. y Japon que estan penetrados hasta en sus tuetanos de la idea anti-RPDC.
					
					  Por lo tanto, en boca de ellos se escucharan solo las malas palabras sobre la RPDC.
					
					  Entonces, ?por que Asahi Shimbun estara tan frenetico en la propaganda tendenciosa anti-RPDC?
					
					  Es que ha pensado que podria congraciarse con su amo gringo y las fuerzas derechistas japonesas si desacreditan el prestigio y la dignidad de la RPDC e inculcan la conciencia hostil a esta.
					
					  En una palabra, la propaganda tendenciosa anti-RPDC revelo la naturaleza de propagandista venal de Asahi Shimbun.
					
					  Los reaccionarios japoneses no podran ganar nada con esa demagogia.
					
					  Nadie prestara oidos a la propaganda anti-RPDC de estos.
					
					  La lucha del pueblo coreano por la construccion de la gran potencia prospera deviene la causa secular que no se puede detener por nada.
					
					  Los conspiradores de Asahi Shimbun deberan ver bien la corriente actual y pagar caro sus actos de provocacion politica.

articles.title: Minju Joson condena ejercicio maritimo Sur de Corea-EE.UU.
articles.content:
Minju Joson condena ejercicio maritimo Sur de Corea-EE.UU.
						
Pyongyang, 20 de julio (ATCC) -- El titere Ministerio de Defensa Nacional del Sur de Corea publico el dia 15 que se librara dentro del mes en curso en los Mares Este y Oeste de Corea el ejercicio militar conjunto Sur de Corea-Estados Unidos y su plan detallado de accion sera definido en las "conversaciones de los ministros de Relaciones Exteriores y Defensa Nacional" de ambas partes a sostenerse el dia 21 en Seul.
					  A pesar de la protesta y la condenacion de la opinion publica interna y externa, la camarilla de traidores surcoreanos trata de desarrollar ese ejercicio con su amo gringo para empeorar las relaciones Norte-Sur, que ya estan en el estado de catastrofe, y provocar la guerra nuclear de agresion al Norte de Corea cuando se le presente la oportunidad.
					
					  Asi senala el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual del dia 20 y continua:
					
					  Lo grave del caso es que el teatro del ejercicio conjunto comprende la linea de demarcacion militar incluyendo las aguas del Mar Oeste de Corea donde se ha entablado en varias ocasiones el agudo choque armado entre ambas partes coreanas. Esto pronostica que este ejercicio puede convertirse en la guerra total.
					
					  Para ocultar esta peligrosidad, los belicistas titeres surcoreanos dicen que el ejercicio conjunto es para hacer frente a la "provocacion del Norte" y significa la "manifestacion de las fuerzas disuasivas al Norte" y la "demostracion de las fuerzas armadas al Norte". Pero, estos dichos no pasan de ser una artimana para enganar la opinion publica interna y externa.
					
					  Ahora la banda de Lee Myung Bak intenta neciamente revalidar a cualquier precio su totalmente fracasada politica de confrontacion fratricida y atropellar a la RPDC a traves del ejercicio conjunto militar Sur de Corea-EE.UU.
					
					  Los belicistas surcoreanos deben portarse con juicio meditando en las consecuencias que emanen de sus maniobras para provocar la guerra contra la RPDC.
